topics.name: Jannah (Paradise)
topics.description: Verses about Paradise, its blessings, and the rewards for the righteous.

ayahs.text: وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ
ayahs.translation: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow.

ayahs.text: قُلْ أَؤُنَبِّئُكُم بِخَيْرٍ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Shall I inform you of [something] better than that? For those who feared Allah will be gardens in the presence of their Lord beneath which rivers flow.'

ayahs.text: مَّثَلُ الْجَنَّةِ الَّتِي وُعِدَ الْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَا أَنْهَارٌ مِّن مَّاءٍ غَيْرِ آسِنٍ
ayahs.translation: Is the description of Paradise, which the righteous are promised, wherein are rivers of water unaltered.

topics.name: Forgiveness (Maghfira)
topics.description: Verses about Allah's mercy, forgiveness, and repentance.

ayahs.text: رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَا إِن نَّسِينَا أَوْ أَخْطَأْنَا
ayahs.translation: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا فَعَلُوا فَاحِشَةً أَوْ ظَلَمُوا أَنفُسَهُمْ ذَكَرُوا اللَّهَ فَاسْتَغْفَرُوا لِذُنُوبِهِمْ
ayahs.translation: And those who, when they commit an immorality or wrong themselves [by transgression], remember Allah and seek forgiveness for their sins.

ayahs.text: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah.'

topics.name: Patience (Sabr)
topics.description: Verses about patience, perseverance, and trusting in Allah's plan.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer.

ayahs.text: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيْءٍ مِّنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْوَالِ وَالْأَنفُسِ وَالثَّمَرَاتِ
ayahs.translation: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا وَرَابِطُوا وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain stationed and fear Allah.

topics.name: Prayer (Salah)
topics.description: Verses about the importance of prayer and worship.

ayahs.text: إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ
ayahs.translation: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.

ayahs.text: الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
ayahs.translation: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer, and spend out of what We have provided for them.

ayahs.text: إِنَّنِي أَنَا اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنَا فَاعْبُدْنِي وَأَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ لِذِكْرِي
ayahs.translation: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.

topics.name: Charity (Zakat)
topics.description: Verses about charity, helping others, and spending in the way of Allah.

ayahs.text: مَّثَلُ الَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ أَمْوَالَهُمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ حَبَّةٍ أَنبَتَتْ سَبْعَ سَنَابِلَ
ayahs.translation: The example of those who spend their wealth in the way of Allah is like a seed [of grain] which grows seven spikes.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنفِقُوا مِن طَيِّبَاتِ مَا كَسَبْتُمْ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned.

ayahs.text: خُذْ مِنْ أَمْوَالِهِمْ صَدَقَةً تُطَهِّرُهُمْ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا
ayahs.translation: Take, [O Muhammad], from their wealth a charity by which you purify them and cause them increase.

topics.name: Faith (Iman)
topics.description: Verses about belief, faith, and trust in Allah.

ayahs.text: ذَٰلِكَ الْكِتَابُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
ayahs.translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allah.

ayahs.text: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ
ayahs.translation: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا آمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, believe in Allah and His Messenger.

topics.name: Knowledge (Ilm)
topics.description: Verses about seeking knowledge and wisdom.

ayahs.text: اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
ayahs.translation: Read in the name of your Lord who created.

ayahs.text: وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
ayahs.translation: And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'

ayahs.text: قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Say, 'Are those who know equal to those who do not know?'

topics.name: Justice (Adl)
topics.description: Verses about justice, fairness, and standing for truth.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُونُوا قَوَّامِينَ بِالْقِسْطِ شُهَدَاءَ لِلَّهِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm in justice, witnesses for Allah.

ayahs.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُونُوا قَوَّامِينَ لِلَّهِ شُهَدَاءَ بِالْقِسْطِ
ayahs.translation: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm for Allah, witnesses in justice.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَأْمُرُ بِالْعَدْلِ وَالْإِحْسَانِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct.

topics.name: Family & Parents
topics.description: Verses about family relations, respect for parents, and family values.

ayahs.text: وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا
ayahs.translation: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment.

ayahs.text: وَوَصَّيْنَا الْإِنسَانَ بِوَالِدَيْهِ إِحْسَانًا
ayahs.translation: And We have enjoined upon man, to his parents, good treatment.

ayahs.text: وَوَصَّيْنَا الْإِنسَانَ بِوَالِدَيْهِ حَمَلَتْهُ أُمُّهُ وَهْنًا عَلَىٰ وَهْنٍ
ayahs.translation: And We have enjoined upon man [care] for his parents. His mother carried him, [increasing her] in weakness upon weakness.

topics.name: Guidance (Hidayah)
topics.description: Verses about divine guidance and the straight path.

ayahs.text: اهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
ayahs.translation: Guide us to the straight path.

ayahs.text: شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِي أُنزِلَ فِيهِ الْقُرْآنُ هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: The month of Ramadhan [is that] in which was revealed the Qur'an, a guidance for the people.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَهْدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقْوَمُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable.

topics.name: Creation of Universe
topics.description: Verses about the creation of heavens, earth, and all living beings.

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ الْمَاءِ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَيٍّ
ayahs.translation: And We made from water every living thing.

ayahs.text: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
ayahs.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِي خَلْقِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and earth, and the alternation of the night and the day.

topics.name: Death & Afterlife
topics.description: Verses about death, the Day of Judgment, and the afterlife.

ayahs.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَائِقَةُ الْمَوْتِ
ayahs.translation: Every soul will taste death.

ayahs.text: الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْمَوْتَ وَالْحَيَاةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا
ayahs.translation: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed.

ayahs.text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
ayahs.translation: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
